quote_first:
Major Yun appeared at General Castleton’s elbow, and handed an interface to the base leader. General Castleton took it, his face darkening and his frown deepening as he read it.
“What is it?” she asked when he looked up. “At
quote_last: this morning, an encrypted message was sent from inside the base.”
title: Outcasts
author: Gail Delaney
